attributes.action: Give northern Ireland more help and funding  for tackling drug addiction.
attributes.additional_details:
21,958 people have died from 2004- 2014.

From 2008-2014 research shows someone dies of drug misuse every 4 days. Let's get help for Northern Ireland now.
attributes.background: Drug addiction is on the up rise in northern Ireland. We are already seeing evidence of herion on the streets & many lives have been lost to drugs. We need funding to help educate our youth & also help those already addicted who are losing the battle to drugs. We need more rehabs centres! PLEASE.

rejection.details:
This isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament could take action on. Responsibility for health and social care in Northern Ireland is a devolved issue.

You could raise this issue with your MLA, who represents you in the Northern Ireland Assembly. You can find your MLA here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/your-mlas/
